title: Leaxcoin - The Evolution of Blockchain for the Real Estate

mainImage.alt: The tecnology that builds the future. Now building the real estate market.

typed:
The Evolution Of The
Real Estate.
A New Currency.
mainText.bottom:
Away with all the real estate transaction problems.
A strong cryptocurrency in the market!

about.title: What Is Leaxcoin?
paragraphs: Away with all the real estate transaction problems! A strong currency in the world! Leaxcoin is a decentralized global currency that adopts the Ethereum blockchain technology, the leader in the smart contract evolution. The Leaxcoin platform comes up with the solution to all the problems with real estate transactions, either in the purchase, rent, lease and real estate launch or in the property registry.

The success of the Leaxcoin platform will be totally achieved with a global community of real estate specialists and experienced developers, who will create the necessary tools to connect all the real estate processes and the regulatory agencies of property registration for a blockchain, everything in compliance with the countless jurisdictions of every country, state and city.

ecosystem.title:
Out Ecosystem A
Global Community
ecosystem.tags:
INVESTORS • TRADITIONAL REAL ESTATE NEGOTIATORS
OWNERS • BROKERS • REAL ESTATE AGENTS • ORGANIZATIONS
REGISTRY OFFICES • REAL ESTATE • AGENCIES
REAL ESTATE SPECIALISTS • DEVELOPERS
paragraphs:
Everybody together, creating an integrated encompassing ecosystem
to facilitate the real estate process inclusion in the blockchain.
ONE-STOP THAT HOSTS ALL THE REAL ESTATE PROCESSES
In this way, the Leaxcoin makes it possible to unify all the traditional and cryptographic investment, ensuring faster speed in the process with less bureaucracy.
And all this in a totally DECENTRALIZED GLOBAL COMMUNITY format!

following.title:
The following
Elements As The Main Focus:

propertyRegistry.title: Property Registry
paragraphs: The entire platform environment is intended for local and global communities, with tools, applications and solutions to a full integration with registry, notary and government institutions, following the local jurisdiction for the transfer of title deeds.
The Leaxcoin platform is protected by blockchain, ensuring an unchangeable database.

As the information and document security is our
number 1 priority!

smartContracts.title:
SMART CONTRACTS —
CONTRACTS, LISTING &
REAL ESTATE CROWDSALE
paragraphs: The Leaxcoin will be the largest global reference in Smart Contracts, not only for the innovating project it presents, but also for the tireless efforts of all people involved when it comes to integrating all the approved regulations for property transfer into the platform.
Security guarantee is the main focus, in order to ensure that every government regulation is followed in each jurisdiction.
By achieving these goals, we will be able to impact on the private sector and reach the State Department, always searching effective and quick ways to mitigate fraud risks.

wallet.title:
OFFICIAL LEAXCOIN WALLET •
SECURITY & PRIVACY
paragraphs: The Leax wallet will be fully developed on the Ethereum blockchain network, which is encrypted to avoid fraud and theft, having Send, Receive and Token Purchase functions.

icon1.title: Security
icon1.description: The assets are locked in the local storage of the wallets, away from any server.

icon2.title: PRIVACY
icon2.description: No personal data or private information is stored on any server.

access.top: You use to send, receive & store your Leax.
access.title: Access Your Wallet

communitySupport.title: COMMUNITY & GLOBAL SUPPORT
paragraphs: The Leaxcoin is very proud of being a real community with real estate specialists from all over the world. Together, we join forces to build a global community of the blockchain revolution enthusiasts, providing new resources to foment the real estate world revolution.
The community is actively encouraged and rewarded for getting involved in the development, marketing and real estate solutions.
If you want to join our community, become an ambassador in your city, state or country!

roadmap.title: The Roadmap
paragraphs:
The Leaxcoin Roadmap focuses on the development of the plataform,
operations, infrastructure, new partinerships and marketing initiatives.

timeline.content: Smart contracts, Token and ICO Conclusion and Trial
Private Sale for Investors Pré-initial Token Offering begins
Wallet for iOS, Android and Desktop
Expansion of the Business in global development

team.title: A Community-Based Initiative
paragraphs: Leaxcoin is an open source project designed by a global community of totally self-funded and high qualified developers, engineers, designers, academics, economists and Blockchain cryptography enthusiasts, who have committed to taking the Leaxcoin to the main cryptocurrencies and making the decentralized technologies fully accessible to everybody.

footer.title: Join The LEAXCOIN PROJECT
paragraphs:
You can join the community by contributing with ideas, feedback,
codes, design, support and dissemination of the Leaxcoin Project
worldwide.
Visit our GitHub page to be a developer.

You are welcome to discuss any project related to Leaxcoin with our
friendly community in our Forums.
Any contribution will be welcome.

contact@leax.io

paragraphs: Nós, da Leaxcoin, um projeto descentralizado para o setor imobiliário gostaríamos de enviar importante comunicado a todos os membros de nossa comunidade, assim como embaixadores, apoiadores, parceiros e investidores.

Como se sabe, nos últimos meses, por meio da parceria realizada entre alguns investidores da Leaxcoin e o grupo Bitcoin Banco, o projeto alcançou grande impulsão e expansão nos últimos meses, por meio da colaboração mútua entre os parceiros.

Contudo, mesmo a parceria tendo trazido inúmeros efeitos positivos para todas as partes, em razão de algumas discordâncias estratégicas, sobretudo em relação ao posicionamento futuro do projeto, decidiu-se, em conjunto, encerrá-la. Cada qual seguirá em seu virtuoso caminho de agora em diante.

Por fim, gostaríamos de informar que a partir de agora teremos alguns membros ativos no Brasil, a fim de desenvolver ainda mais nossa plataforma global, bem como convidar a todos que se interessam pelo projeto de melhoria no setor imobiliário a fazer parte de nossa comunidade. Será um prazer tê-los conosco.
